QuestData.Title: The Damned
QuestData.Description: First of all, look at your armor. You're a mess, $c.$b$bIf you'd like to stay in one piece--and I've no doubt you do--perhaps I can help. If you can gather some paws and wings from the wolves and bats nearby, maybe I'll find some armor for you. You'll find the creatures to the north and to the west of here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 4 Scavenger Paws and 4 Duskbat Wings.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do try your best to keep yourself unharmed until I get you some armor.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. This armor should help you out.$b$bHopefully, it should do you more good than the last one to wear it...
